    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question​(int id,
                java.util.Date creationDate,
                java.util.Date deletionDate,
                int score,
                java.lang.String body,
                java.util.Date lastEditDate,
                java.util.Date closedDate,
                java.util.Date communityOwnedDate,
                User owner,
                User lastEditor,
                java.lang.String title,
                int favoriteCount,
                int viewCount,
                java.lang.String[] tags)
        A class constructor for all attribute (null possible)
        Parameters:
        id - The question id
        creationDate - the date when the question has been created
        deletionDate - the date when the question has been deleted, null if the question hasn't been deleted
        score - The question score on SO
        body - The question body
        lastEditDate - The last time the question has been edited
        closedDate - The date when the question has been closed (null if the answer is open)
        communityOwnedDate - The date when the question started to belong to the community
        owner - The user that owns the question
        lastEditor - The last editor of the question
        title - The title of the question
        favoriteCount - the score of favorite
        viewCount - the number of view
        tags - all the tags in the question
